resources.string:
Hello and welcome to the
Student Discount Locator! 
To search for discounts press the Search Button. 
To submit a new discount press the Submit Button.
Use the menu to choose what kinds of discounts you want!

Hey there! It looks like this is your first time using Student Discount Locator so there are a few things we need to go over.

Purpose:
This app is intended to help users save money by storing and retrieving discounts based on location. To do this, the app requires access to location and the ability to store data.
 Location is used to determine what discounts are near you and where any submitted discounts are located. This info is only used for the aforementioned purposes and is not stored or sold.
The data stored on your phone consists of whether you have seen this page and a "score" to determine value of submissions.

About Us:
We are a group of students from Grand Valley State University's Android development course. This app is our final project and is meant to showcase the skills we learned. We receive no financial gains from the app and will never charge users. This app will be periodically updated as we become aware of issues and desired improvements.

 Legal Terms:
By using Student Discount Locator you agree to:
1. not submit false or misleading information,
2. not hold us liable for any false submissions of other users. 

Thank you for trying Student Discount Locator!
Press the back button to get started.
